about_the_game:
Deathrun is a contemporary twist on the classic multiplayer game mode beloved in the Garry's Mod and Counter-Strike communities. It's a blend of rapid reflexes, strategic trap placement, and adrenaline-fueled competition. Here’s what players can expect:

Fast-Paced Multiplayer Action

  • Engage in thrilling races with friends or solo against players from around the world.
  • Experience heart-stopping moments as you dodge and weave through deadly traps.
  • Revel in the chaos of multiplayer dynamics where alliances are fleeting.

Dual Roles with Unique Objectives

  • Play as a Runner, racing against time and traps to reach the end alive.
  • Take on the mantle of the Death, setting off cunning traps to halt the runners' progress.

Innovative Level Design

  • Explore a variety of challenging maps, each with its own set of traps and obstacles.
  • Navigate through expertly crafted levels that will test your agility and strategic planning.

Competitive Play and Matchmaking

  • Climb the ranks in a matchmaking system that pairs you with players of similar skill.
  • Track your progress and aim for the top of the leaderboards.

Regular Updates & Events

  • Enjoy fresh content with regular updates that introduce new challenges and features.
  • Participate in community events and competitions with unique themes and rewards.

A Modern Recreation with a Nostalgic Core

  • Experience the classic gameplay of Deathrun reimagined with modern technology.
  • Delight in the nostalgic elements that pay homage to the original modded game modes.
  • Join the ever-growing community of Deathrun and put your skills to the ultimate test. Will you sprint to victory or craft the perfect trap? The choice is yours.

content_descriptors.notes: Deathrun features mature content with a strong emphasis on graphic violence and gore. Players will encounter a variety of detailed death-effects, showcasing intense scenarios that result in explicit bloodshed and dismemberment.

name: Deathrun
short_description: Deathrun is an electrifying online multiplayer sprint where speed, strategy, and survival go hand-in-hand. Team up or go solo in a race through a treacherous obstacle course where every player is for themselves. Dodge traps, outpace the competition, and don’t trust anyone.
